title: Ruby Dates not being parsed with +0000 timezone
body:
by **jackbox55**: 
Attached is testcase which tries to parse RubyDates which were gathered from 
Twitter.

It fails on all dates gathered from Twitter, it works when I change the 
timezone from +0000 to -0000

I'm checked-out on the release tag.
Attachments: 1. rubydate.go (1391 bytes)
